1293970.name: Sound Science
1293970.description:
Greetings, future scientist! I am the Honorable, Sir Lord Dr. Professor Walrus, Ph.D., D.V.M., D.D.S., M.D., Esquire the Third! Together, you and I shall embark upon a journey to understand sound! Welcome to Sound Science!

  • Puzzles based on the properties of Sound Waves
  • Explosions
  • Resonance
  • Amplifiers
  • Redirection
  • Refraction
  • Feedback loops
  • Portals
  • Rebelling interns
1293970.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
